attributes.comment:
As a tutor of immigrants aspiring to be citizens, I am constantly struck by the
quality of each immigrant student. It would seem that we all should be ASKING
these people to be fellow citizens, not throwing up barriers. I believe the
proposed increase in fee is way too high. $390, including fingerprint charges,
seemed about right. The time period between the submitted application and the
final interview has seemed about right. Additionally, I am rather skeptical that
more money will increase the efficiency of your bureaucracy. Actually, it is
the attitude of that bureaucracy that concerns us most. Whatever happened to
"Give me your tired, your poor"?
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Patricia A. Eaton
